metadata.title: Daily Sweat - Your Personal AI Workout Planner (IT Placeholder)
metadata.description: Get personalized daily workout plans generated by AI. Track your progress and stay motivated with Daily Sweat. (IT Placeholder)

footer.tagline: Â© {year} Daily Sweat. Sweat Smarter, Not Harder. (IT Placeholder)

workoutGenerator.title: Create Your Workout (IT Placeholder)
workoutGenerator.description: Tell us your preferences, and we'll generate a personalized workout plan for you. (IT Placeholder)
workoutGenerator.muscleGroupsPlaceholder: e.g., Legs, Core, Arms or Full Body (IT Placeholder)
workoutGenerator.equipmentPlaceholder: e.g., Dumbbells, Resistance Bands, Bodyweight (IT Placeholder)

workoutDisplay.title: Your Workout Plan (IT Placeholder)
workoutDisplay.emptyState: Generate a workout plan using the form to see it here. (IT Placeholder)
workoutDisplay.noExercises: No exercises in this plan. Try generating a new one! (IT Placeholder)

activeWorkoutDisplay.title: Active Workout (IT Placeholder)
activeWorkoutDisplay.noCurrentExercise: No current exercise. This shouldn't happen! (IT Placeholder)

difficultyFeedback.title: Rate Your Workout (IT Placeholder)
difficultyFeedback.description: Help us improve your next workout by rating the difficulty of this plan. (IT Placeholder)

workoutHistory.title: Workout History (IT Placeholder)
workoutHistory.description: Review your past workout sessions. (IT Placeholder)
workoutHistory.emptyState: No past workouts found. Complete some workouts to see them here! (IT Placeholder)

restTimer.title: Rest Timer (IT Placeholder)
restTimer.description: Take a breather, then hit it hard! (IT Placeholder)

chatbot.dialogDescription: Ask any fitness or nutrition related questions. (IT Placeholder)
chatbot.inputPlaceholder: Ask about exercises, diet, etc... (IT Placeholder)
chatbot.initialMessage: Hello! I'm Daily Sweat AI. Ask me anything about fitness, nutrition, or your workouts! (IT Placeholder)
chatbot.errorMessage: Sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again later. (IT Placeholder)

toasts.workoutGeneratedDescription: Your new workout plan is ready. (IT Placeholder)
toasts.restOverDescription: Time to get back to it! (IT Placeholder)
toasts.workoutCompleteDescription: Great job finishing your workout! (IT Placeholder)
toasts.workoutEndedDescription: Come back soon for another session! (IT Placeholder)

errors.invalidAIPlan: Received an invalid workout plan format from AI. Please try again. (IT Placeholder)
errors.emptyAIPlan: The AI generated an empty workout plan. Please try different parameters. (IT Placeholder)
errors.noWorkoutToAdjust: No current workout to adjust. (IT Placeholder)
errors.invalidAdjustedAIPlan: Received an invalid adjusted workout plan format from AI. Please try again. (IT Placeholder)
errors.emptyAdjustedAIPlan: The AI adjusted to an empty workout plan. Please try different feedback or generate a new plan. (IT Placeholder)
errors.failedToGenerate: Failed to generate workout. Please try again later. (IT Placeholder)
errors.failedToAdjust: Failed to adjust workout difficulty. Please try again. (IT Placeholder)
errors.cannotStartEmptyWorkout: Cannot start an empty or non-existent workout. Please generate a workout first. (IT Placeholder)
